_comment: Next.js Supabase AI SDK Dev Plugin - Local dev environment setup
_notes: Installs Vercel CLI on remote, warns on local
Sets up Supabase local dev: CLI, Docker, server, env vars, dev server
Check hooks moved to rule-based system in project-context plugin
description: Local development environment setup for Next.js, Supabase, and AI SDK projects

hooks.description: Installs Vercel CLI on remote, warns if missing on local
Sets up Supabase local dev: installs CLI, starts Docker, starts Supabase, exports env vars, starts dev server
Logs Task tool calls before agent execution. Saves context for later retrieval in SubagentStop hooks.
Validates Supabase environment variables in .env.local and dev.vars files. Blocks deprecated names (SUPABASE_ANON_KEY, SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY) and incorrect prefixes.
Logs Task tool results after agent completion. Captures agent output and context for analysis.
